downloadTitle: PCI Implementation Guide for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R3
downloadDescription: This guide describes how to implement Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R3 in compliance with the Payment Card Industry (PCI) Data Security Standard version 2.0.

downloadFile.name: PCI Implementation Guide_Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R3.pdf

detailsSection: The requirements in this guide must be followed to implement Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R3 and Payment Services for Microsoft Dynamics ERP (the integrated payment solution from Microsoft) in a manner that is compliant with the Payment Card Industry (PCI) Data Security Standard version 2.0.
detailsSection_file_name: PCI Implementation Guide_Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R3.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the manual in PDF file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
